def InitializeRow(entity, row): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.ERP.Comum import ErpEnvironment
if row.EditCommand != None: row.EditCommand.Visible = entity.PodeAlterar if row.DeleteCommand != None: row.DeleteCommand.Visible = entity.PodeExcluir
